data.name: Oddworld: Soulstorm Enhanced Edition Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or equivalent
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
